content: the patchwork prism baby blanket is a fun colorful and full of texture this blanket uses a combination of basic stitches as well as some front and back post stitches the size of the blanket with 16 squares and the border is 34 5 x 34 5 / 88 cm x 88 cm but is easily adaptable you can choose to crochet more or less squares since the border works with any stitch increment this blanket uses only 2 colors and 3 skeins of each color the contrast color is a self striping yarn and the yarn is carried up with each round only 4 ends to weave in for each square this pattern is available for free to view on my ad supported website the ad free pdf includes written directions in us terminology 14 point font for easier reading a full page chart of the crochet square and a gift tag for gifting your finished blanket to purchase a kit from mary maxim that includes the printed pattern and the yarn required to make the blanket please see my website for the link this pattern has been tested and there are helpful video tutorials to help you along if needed stitches used pattern is written in us terms bpdc back post double_crochet bphdc back post half_double_crochet bpsc back post single_crochet chain s chain s double_crochet double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch this pattern is copyright 2024 handmade by stacy j please do not duplicate or copy any portion of this pattern as well as photographs you are encouraged to share images of your final product and are allowed to sell final products i just ask that if you sell your final product please purchase the ad-free pdf provide your own photographs and that you please credit handmade by stacy j as the designer if you choose to purchase the pdf please note that due to the nature of the pdf being digital no refunds will be given thank you for your support
